data.name: Commercial Loans
data.description: Suncorp Commercial Loans are designed for businesses with a broad range of funding requirements (including business expansion, Management Letting Rights, Property Investment and Development).

features.additionalInfo: Interest rate type: Fixed and variable interest options available
Repayment type: Principle and interest and interest only repayment options available
Term: One year up to 15 years loan terms available
Security: Residential, commercial or rural property security required. Business assets may also be acceptable.
May form part of a Business Ready Package depending on eligibility criteria.
Redraw available, subject to conditions and fees.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a registered Australian business with a current ABN or ACN.
Provide 2 consecutive years of financial information. This may be for a business you currently own or for a business you plan to purchase.
Security such as cash, residential, commercial or rural property, business assets, or a combination of these

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Subject to Negotiation. Determined at application

fees.name: Self Managed Superannuation Funds Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the borrower is a Self Managed Superannuation Fund and is charged for the Bank to undertake due diligence on the proposed lending structure

fees.name: Ongoing Fees
fees.additionalInfo: All businesses are different, and accordingly, the cost of a business loan will differ depending on your type of business and your needs. Ongoing Fees determined at application.

fees.name: Early Payment Interest Adjustment (EPIA) Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Determined at the time you break your Fixed Rate. Refer to your Letter of Offer for more detail on how the EPIA is calculated.

fees.name: Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on requests for Suncorp bank to provide consent (e.g. consent to lease, consent to subdivision)

fees.name: Consent Fee - with Title Deeds
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when Suncorp Bank is requested to provide consent together with the production of title deeds.

fees.name: Documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on the number of security and supporting documents that are required to be prepared. Minimum Amount for up to 3 documents. Additional documents $200 each.

fees.name: Legal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we advise that we need legal advice to prepare documentation, certify or settle your facilities. Amount may vary and will be advised before proceeding.

fees.name: Progress Drawdown Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a progressive drawdown of your Term Loan facility. Determined at application.

fees.name: Release Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for the number of security documents released (each).

fees.name: Company and Title Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when Suncorp Bank requires copies of these documents. Other searches will be actual cost plus $15.

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for completing a settlement of your facility (per settlement).

fees.name: Substitution of Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we agree to substitute a security for another security. Fee does not include government charges or new valuation costs.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Determined by the Valuer at the time of loan application.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you request a change to the Letter of Offer.
